name: Darts VR
description: Darts VR is a casual sports game. Take part in the most immersive arena or party experience with your family and friends. The game offers party mode and professional arena mode. You can play two player game in arena or practice in single player game. Keep track of best scores and session best score for party mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
